item.title: Windows 10
item.description: BlueTooth蓝牙问题 CSR 4.0 USB蓝牙适配器出现偶尔断开的问题。 解决方法：安装 Generic Bluetooth Adapter 选择 Generic Bluetooth Adapter Driver 系统启动相关 主板进入BIOS 开机 按ESC 进

item.title: Win10onMac
item.description: Partition on Mac mini. Just only one SSD while install win10 and osx After finish installation, add the second HDD Notice: other wise, windows 10 can not recognzied the partition. Apple bluetooth keyboard. Under Device Manager, find the Broadcom wireless adapter, enable the bluetooth collaboration Hold ctrl+w while searhing bluetooth devices.
